author: Rahul Tripathi
title: 50% of NDRF personnel to be Covid-19 warriors
description: NDRF first flagged the threat from the virus, which originated in Wuhan (China), in February and has since then been training personnel at land, seaports and airports to handle inbound passengers and create awareness.
content:
NEW DELHI: The National Disaster Response Force (NDRF) will equip 600 of its personnel in every battalion to help health workers contain the Covid-19 virus outbreak, said SN Pradhan, its director general.
